comment.comment: VJ FIND - executes when a line in the activity VJ is clicked

link.expressions.link.expressions: if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and company=\""+evaluate(company in $File)+"\"")
if null(contact.name in $File) then (contact.name in $File=callback.contact in $File);$fill.skip.master=true
if (null(contact.name in $File) and option()~=8) then ($L.void=rtecall("msg", $L.result, scmsg(20, "BPPM"));$autocomplete.msg=scmsg(20, "BPPM");$fill.skip=true)

$L.subscription.qry="((subscriberType=\"contacts\" and subscriber=\""+nullsub(contact.name in $File, "")+"\") or (subscriberType=\"dept\" and subscriber=\""+nullsub(dept in $L.contact.file, "")+"\")) and (status=\"Active\" or status=\"Cancellation Requested\")"
$L.comments="No subscriptions found, go for query device directly"
if ($L.subscription.success.flg2~=true) then if (not (null(affected.item in $File))) then ($query="logical.name#\""+affected.item in $File+"\"")
if ($L.subscription.success.flg2=true) then ($query="SELECT ta01.* FROM device ta01 WHERE ta01.logical.name isin (select distinct ta02.serviceName from Subscription ta02")

if ($L.subscription.success.flg2=true) then $query+=(" WHERE (((ta02.subscriberType=\"contacts\" and ta02.subscriber=\""+nullsub(contact.name in $File, "")+"\") or (ta02.subscriberType=\"dept\" and ta02.subscriber=\""+nullsub(dept in $L.contact.file, "")+"\")) and (ta02.status=\"Active\" or ta02.status=\"Cancellation Requested\"))")
if ($L.subscription.success.flg2=true) then if (not (null(affected.item in $File))) then ($query=$query+") and ta01.logical.name#\""+affected.item in $File+"\"") else ($query=$query+")")
$L.comments="Append device.type cond for both subscriptions found or not"
$L.comments="Append company condition only if no subscriptions"
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File)) and $L.subscription.success.flg2~=true) then $query+=(" and company=\""+company in $File+"\"")
if (not (null(contact.name in $File)) and not (null($L.valid.subscriptions))) then ($fill.recurse.msg=scmsg(6, "fill", {contact.name in $File}))
if (not (null(1 in assignment in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+str(1 in assignment in $File)+"\"")
if (not (null(class in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and class#\""+class in $File+"\"")
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and company=\""+evaluate(company in $File)+"\"")
if (not (null(opened.by in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+opened.by in $File+"\"")
if (not (null(updated.by in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+updated.by in $File+"\"")
if (not (null(closed.by in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+closed.by in $File+"\"")

$L.folders={};for $L.y = 1 to lng(denull(folders in tableAccess in $G.sm.environment)) do (if (5 in $L.y in folders in tableAccess in $G.sm.environment~="never") then ($L.folders=$L.folders+{1 in $L.y in folders in tableAccess in $G.sm.environment}))
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and company=company in $File"
if $G.multi then if (not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=\"DEFAULT\" or company#company in $File)"
if (not (null(category in $File))) then $query+=jscall("queryUtil.buildMLangLinkQuery", "category", category in $File, $G.sdCategories, $G.sdCategories.local, true)
if $G.multi then if (not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=\"DEFAULT\" or company#company in $File)"
if (not (null(category in $File))) then $query+=jscall("queryUtil.buildMLangLinkQuery", "category", category in $File, $G.sdCategories, $G.sdCategories.local, true)
if (not (null(subcategory in $File))) then $query+=jscall("queryUtil.buildMLangLinkQuery", "subcategory", subcategory in $File, $G.sdSubcategories, $G.sdSubcategories.local, true)
if (not (null(product.type in $File))) then $query+=jscall("queryUtil.buildMLangLinkQuery", " area.name", product.type in $File, $G.sdAreas, $G.sdAreas.local)
if $G.multi then if (not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=\"DEFAULT\" or company#company in $File)"
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and company=\""+evaluate(company in $File)+"\"")
if (not (null(assignment in $File))) then $query+=(" and name=\""+1 in assignment in $File+"\"")
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=company in $File or company=\"DEFAULT\")"
if (not (null(assignment in $File)) and not (null(denull($assignment.operators)))) then $query+=" and name isin $assignment.operators"
if (not (null(assignee.name in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#assignee.name in $File")

post.expressions.post.expressions: if null(callback.contact in $File) then (callback.contact in $File=contact.name in $File)
if null(contact.name in $File) then (contact.name in $File=callback.contact in $File)
if null(initial.impact in $L.source) then (initial.impact in $L.source=default.impact in $L.target)
if null(severity in $L.source) then (severity in $L.source=problem.priority in $L.target)
